messages.content: Are you saying the ones who suffer most are billionaire psychopaths? I’m confused by the wording.
I don’t understand how her parents were able to take kid when she claims they are horrible alcoholics
Yeah, even though I give it to him that it was confusing that they designed Crysis 1 for PCs that wouldn't come out for like 5 years.
I'm not sure losing billions in trade is in anyone's interest other that political zealots.
Maybe she was attempting to be ironic? I dunno, man, people are just an enigma.
Wouldn’t doubt its for good reasons, just didn’t understand what the were.
Generally you are still a “teacher” but I’m not sure 100%. I know my instructional coach role is still “teacher” contract/pay.
Yeah super confused about that considering it was only [NAME] she had beef with lol
I know. I didn't say I agreed with it did I?
I never think someone is sincere when they say why “would I care if I’m being lied to” constantly?
Maybe so , i just dont know about him, team has enough turmoil they just dont need any more distractions
ok? dont really know what that has to do with it. [NAME] designs the offense, [NAME] just runs it
Yeah fair, plus this sub tends to go hard in different directions so it becomes extra hard to know if someone really is just that far gone.
If everyone else can figure this out, then I don't see why it's so implausible for the US.
I hope so but doubt it...
We finally lost a game while I was shuffling my tarot deck and now I can’t decide if I should try again or if the luck ran out
Why am I seeing this everywhere now? This wasn't in my vocabulary last week.
Idk if I’m wrong but I think they gave her some piercings on her ear which are cool too
What's that like? Like what's the thought process? I dunno. I know what's a weird question..i just can't imagine
Some aren't. Either way it's a mystery how they obrained so many M1s.
